Test Cases: Manager/ Customer can change his own account password
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Old Password"
Expected Result: The manager/ customer successfully change his password

Test Steps: 2) Enter a valid "New Password"
3) Enter a valid "Confirm Password"
4) Click on the "Submit" button
